definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: In the distance sounded a solemn, stirring reed flute.
The Bronze Ever-ringing Bell functions as a constant reminder of the tragically heroic period in history.
sentences.chinese: 这口铜制的长鸣钟警示我们要记住这段悲壮的历史。

sentences.english: One time of vicissitudes, a solemn and stirring story.
sentences.chinese: 一个沧桑的年代，一个悲壮的故事。

sentences.english: A hero fights for freedom , a beautiful , solemn and stirring epic .
sentences.chinese: 一个为自由而战的英雄，一段凄美悲壮的诗史。

sentences.english: And walk through this bumpiness road, in the solemn song of sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 在这悲壮歌声中，走过这崎岖险阻的道路。

sentences.english: The long flames sang their drumming chorus in voices of the heaviest bass.
sentences.chinese: 长长的火舌呼呼地用最低的音唱出悲壮的歌。

sentences.english: Men's choice is always solemn and stirring.
sentences.chinese: 男人的抉择，总是悲壮的。

sentences.english: I felt the very solemn weight of history.
sentences.chinese: 我读出了一种非常悲壮的一种历史感。

sentences.english: He won't miss a dramatic beat in a war story.
sentences.chinese: 在战争故事中，他不会错过一场悲壮的战斗。

sentences.english: Actually the spiritual vagrancy are more complex, solemn and stirring.
sentences.chinese: 精神流浪比生活流浪更见其复杂性和悲壮性。

sentences.english: The two lovers happy, always has the heroic sacrifice oneself.
sentences.chinese: 两情相悦的幸福，背后总有自我牺牲的悲壮。

sentences.english: Braveheart------ . A hero fighting for freedom, some inspired by the tragic history of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 一个为自由而战的英雄，一段凄美悲壮的诗史。

sentences.english: Sudden feeling their action are very solemn and stirring, has suffices soul-stirringly.
sentences.chinese: 突然感觉自己的举动很悲壮，有够荡气回肠。

sentences.english: This manifests the solemn and stirring character of raptural situation in the revolutionary literature.
sentences.chinese: 这显示出革命文学“决裂”场景的悲壮性。

sentences.english: Sophia was charmed with the contemplation of so heroic an action.
sentences.chinese: 想到这样一种悲壮的行为，苏菲亚不胜陶醉了。

sentences.english: However, his braveness could no longer save the power plant from fate of explosion.
sentences.chinese: 他的悲壮已经不能挽救电站爆炸的命运。

definition: to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
sad melody/stirring strains/elegy/dirge/threnody/sing with solemn fervor
